name: Cyberspace VR - BETA
description:
VR Internet 3.0 is the evolution of Browsing the internet trough the Cyberspace, where every website is a physical Node on the Network. If you like this project and would like to Support us continue developing it, you can by donating here.

This is a hobby project for me and I'm giving it for free to anyone who wants to try. Cyberspace and Internet should stay free. 



Cyberspace by definition refers to the virtual computer world, and more specifically, an electronic medium that is used to facilitate online communication. Cyberspace typically involves a large computer network made up of many worldwide computer subnetworks that employ TCP/IP protocol to aid in communication and data exchange activities.


Cyberspace's core feature is an interactive and virtual environment for a broad range of participants.






Features currently fully working:

- Browse the internet, type in a web URL and fly physically trough the cyberspace to that location inside the cyberspace physically
- PC Keyboard fully functional
- Built with Oculus Quest 2 support in mind, Has fully VR support for Oculus Quest 2 ( other VR gears not tested yet)
- Experience unique Cyberspace locations for this build we built 50 most used US websites by hand, the most famous websites have their own look and feel.
